name: Forgotten Red Panda
description:
This bamboo forest has long been your home.
Unfortunately, it's now overrun with your predators, Martens.
Escape while you still can, Red Panda.

Description

Forgotten Red Panda is a 2D side-scrolling adventure game that has you navigating a lost and forgotten red panda out of its former bamboo forest home. 

You'll find enemies such as the predators, Martens or obstacles such as rocks and fall pits. Be wary of these on your journey.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Jump, Move Left and Right
  • X - Attack
  • C  - Dash
  • Space - Reset Back to Checkpoint
  • Escape - Back to Main Menu
